carpet.rule.openFakePlayerInventory.name: Fake Player Inventory
carpet.rule.openFakePlayerInventory.desc: Allow player to open the fake player's inventory
carpet.rule.openFakePlayerEnderChest.des: Allow player to open the fake player's ender chest
carpet.rule.fakePlayerResident.name: Fake Player Resident
carpet.rule.fakePlayerResident.desc: Keep the fake player when exiting the level
carpet.rule.fakePlayerReloadAction.name: Fake Player Reload Action
carpet.rule.fakePlayerReloadAction.desc: Keep the fake player action when exiting the level
Make fake player to auto replenishment
carpet.rule.fakePlayerAutoFish.name: Fake Player Auto Fish
carpet.rule.fakePlayerAutoFish.desc: Make fake player to auto fish
carpet.rule.fakePlayerAutoReplaceTool.de: Make fake player to auto replace almost damaged tool
carpet.rule.betterFenceGatePlacement.des: Make the placed fence gate have the same block status as the fence gate you clicked
carpet.rule.betterWoodStrip.name: Better Wood Strip
carpet.rule.betterWoodStrip.desc: Only the axe with "Strip" in its name is allowed to peel logs
carpet.rule.betterSignInteraction.name: Better Sign Interaction
carpet.rule.betterSignInteraction.desc: Make the block attached to the sign interact when you right-click it
carpet.rule.betterSignEditing.name: Better Sign Editing
carpet.rule.betterSignEditing.desc: Possible to use feather editing sign with "pen" in the name
carpet.rule.betterQuickCrafting.name: Better Quick Crafting
carpet.rule.betterQuickCrafting.desc: Keep an item in the inventory during quick crafting
carpet.rule.botManagement.name: Bot Management
carpet.rule.traderSpawnTips.name: Trader Spawn Tips
carpet.rule.traderSpawnTips.desc: Prompt for the reason for the failed generation of wandering merchants
carpet.rule.qnmdLC.name: Set LC value
carpet.rule.qnmdLC.desc: What is the height value for setting the LC value
